articles.author: Emilee Speck
articles.title: School bus-sized satellite to crash into Earth's atmosphere this week - Fox Weather
articles.description: A defunct European Space Agency 38-foot satellite will come crashing down to Earth on Wednesday, more than a decade after the spacecraft finished its mission.
articles.content: A defunct European Space Agency satellite the size of a school bus will come crashing down to Earth on Wednesday, more than a decade after the spacecraft finished its mission observing Earth's system… [+4167 chars]
